text: Admiral Muhammad Zakaullah NI (M), Chief of the Naval Staff of the Pakistan Navy called on the Chief of Defence Staff Air Chief Marshal Kolitha Gunatilleke at the Office of the Chief of Defence Staff on 12th June 2017.During this cordial discussion, Chief of Defence Staff and the Admiral Muhammad Zakaullah NI (M) shared thoughts of military history of both countries and exchanged views on matters of bilateral interest and recalled the longstanding relations between Pakistan and Sri Lanka.The meeting culminated with the exchange of mementoes to mark the visit.Admiral Muhammad Zakaullah NI (M), Chief of the Naval Staff of the Pakistan Navy called on the Chief of Defence Staff Air Chief Marshal Kolitha Gunatilleke at the Office of the Chief of Defence Staff on 12th June 2017.During this cordial discussion, Chief of Defence Staff and the Admiral Muhammad Zakaullah NI (M) shared thoughts of military history of both countries and exchanged views on matters of bilateral interest and recalled the longstanding relations between Pakistan and Sri Lanka.The meeting culminated with the exchange of mementoes to mark the visit.
title: Chief of the naval staff of the Pakistan navy called on the chief of Defence staff
